raw: THE VALIDATION OF LAWS ACT, 1975 CONTENTS 1. Short title and commencement 2. Validation of laws THE SCHEDULE Titles and Numbers of laws I. PRESIDENT'S ORDERS II. ORDINANCES III. MARTIAL LAW REGULATIONS IV. REGULATIONS V. WEST PAKISTAN ORDINANCES REGULATIONS VI. PUNJAB ORDINANCES VII. SIND ORDINANCES MARTIAL LAW ORDERS (ZONE ‘D’) VIII. NORTH-WEST FRONTIER PROVINCE ORDINANCES REGULATION IX. BALUCHISTAN ORDINANCES Titles and Numbers of laws REGULATION THE VALIDATION OF LAWS ACT, 1975 ACT No. LXIII OF 1975 [24th July, 1975] An Act to validate certain President's Orders, Martial Law Regulations, Martial Law Orders and other laws. WHEREAS clause (I) of Article 270 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan provides that Parliament may by law validate all Proclamations, President's Orders, Martial Law Regulations, Martial Law Orders and other laws made between the twenty-fifth day of March, 1969, and the nineteenth day of December, 1971 ; AND WHEREAS it is expedient to validate certain President's Orders, Martial Law Regulations, Martial Law Orders and other laws made asaforesaid ; It is hereby enacted as follows :- 1. Short title and commencement. (1) This Act may be called the Validation of Laws Act, 1975. (2) It shall come into force at once. 2. Validation of laws. The laws mentioned in the Schedule are hereby declared to have been validly made by competent authority. THE SCHEDULE [see section 2] Titles and Numbers of laws I. PRESIDENT'S ORDERS 1. The Province of West Pakistan (Dissolution) Order, 1970 (P. O. No. 1 of 1970). 2. The High Courts (Establishment) Order, 1970 (P. O. No. 8 of 1970). 3. The High Court Judges (Leave, Pension and Privileges) Order, 1970 (P. O. No. 9 of 1970). 4. The Preparation of Electoral Rolls (Centrally Administered Tribal Areas) Order, 1970 (P. O. No. 13 of 1970). 5. The High Court Judges (Leave, Pension and Privileges) (Amendment) Order, 1970 (P. O. No. 15 of 1970). 6. The High Courts (Establishment) (Amendment) Order, 1970 (P
